thread.title: Clausen Tabbed March Arion Sellier Reining Rider Of The Month
thread.title_full: Clausen Tabbed March Arion Sellier Reining Rider Of The Month

author: Via SMU Athletics
title: Clausen Tabbed March Arion Sellier Reining Rider Of The Month
text:
Clausen Tabbed March Arion Sellier Reining Rider Of The Month
WACO, Texas (NCEA/SMU) â€“
Mustangs graduate student Shelby Clausen was named the March Arion Sellier Reining Rider of the Month by the National Collegiate Equestrian Association (NCEA) on Wednesday. In SMU's two meets in the month, Clausen posted a 2-0 record in Reining while also earning MOP honors. This extended her win streak to four, the longest of her SMU career. Against No. 3 Oklahoma State, Clausen posted a score of 76.5 to take the win and the MOP for the event. The Cave Creek, Arizona, native's score was her highest since she joined SMU prior to last season. Her...
